AttributeList.Text: I think the "PREMELT" flag depends from this flag. ANd "PREMELT" must set when "PREPARED" is set, and reset after melt

THIS IS SHIT! We cannot use GD01.S43 for start a melt, beacuse the signals GD01-S43 are using in safety system to release MCB, and there is a delay... And we should remember about OCT which requires the automatic switch MCB.
TODO: delete -S43 and use HMI....
MCB: start from desk or start by OCT
Mode 0: use real voltage measurement Mode 1: use an estimated voltage
